title: How to dress like a K-pop star - Quora

response.answer_text: We all (kpop fans ) obsessed with kpop idol looks, we admire their sense of style. So, here's how to dress or stylize like kpop idols. • Tight Outfits…No need Kpop idols wear skinny jeans and tight tops but..they balance it with loose, layered clothing • Cute and Colourful Prints Find shirts or hoddie with Pop art prints and cute designs. The prints need to be sleek. Avoid tie-dye shirts. Kpop world talks about prints and colors.  The old rules of simple dress, pumps and cardigan is out of the door. • Mix Match You have to mix different genres together. For example: a semi formal with casual ex sneakers with an office blazer or you could go with streetwear and party dress ex t-shirt and evening party skirt or long chiffon skirt with a printed t-shirt. Maybe even a party short dress and army jacket.  Ripped jeans are fun twist on your average everyday jean. Style ripped jeans with a classic graphic t-shirt for an easy everyday look. • Baseball Caps Not only for stylish but they also provide protection from the sun on hotter days.   • Oversized sunglasses Have the kpop star vibe with oversized sunglasses.  • Bomber Jacket You can put bomber Jacket on over a t-shirt or tank top. • Tall shocks with shorts It's simple to paired with shorts a skirts but yet effective way to look like kpop idols. • Accessories Now for accessories, This is very simple as well. Layering isn't for your clothes, kpop idols are also known to wear a TON of loud and Colourful Chunky bracelets , long drop earrings, chokers, layered necklaces, arm cuffs are all good additions.    Wear a headband or leave those straight hair fixed with a hairspray to keep the style • Make up on especially eyeliner It gives you a mysterious and sexy look even if the rest of your makeup is simple.  • Dye your hair Many people are afraid of changing their hair color especially if it is pink, yellow or blue. But sometime you have to give a try. Change is always good. I have noticed that when someone change their hair color they seem different person. If you have black hair why not switch it up into a dark red. So, just go for it and have fun. And the blonde haircolor can't be missed..  So guys, this was about kpop fashion. Information credit goes to Korean fashion blogs. Hope this helps you. —DEEVIN
